content:
MANILA - Detained Senator Leila de Lima on Monday received a visit from her fellow opposition senators.

Senators Franklin Drilon, Francis Pangilinan, Antonio Trillanes IV, and Risa Hontiveros arrived 11 a.m. at the Philippine National Police (PNP) Custodial Center in Quezon City, where De Lima has been detained since February for alleged involvement in the drug activities of convicted criminals.

title: Opposition senators visit De Lima in Crame
